title: dhru9
author: dhru9
created_time: June 01, 2022, 12:53:09 AMLast edit: June 21, 2022, 05:05:23 AM by dhru9
content: Coinriders is good alternative for sites like coingecko and coinmarketcap just much better. History moment 6/19/2022  (Still Beta)We are  the first to add notification system for more than 16k coins. You can see the report here  full details about it hereHow to access the site: https://coinriders.com/

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: dhru9 on June 01, 2022, 12:53:09 AM2. predictions by youtubers and members.Is it limited to five or there's a bug in the "view more" button?- I do like how easily we can read the description part [by clicking each row] for each of the predictions, but I think it would've been better with an ignore or favorite button for each of the users [not sure if it can be done without the need to create accounts].Quote from: dhru9 on June 01, 2022, 12:53:09 AMLet me  know if you prefer white theme or dark theme  ☠It depends on the time of the day...

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: dhru9 on June 01, 2022, 12:53:09 AMLet me  know if you prefer white theme or dark theme I prefer using dark theme and I use that for most websites, but I think you should make some updates and fixes on pages for each coin.For example, when I click on Bitcoin I can see three tabs, About, Top Pairs and Predictions, but when I click on them they open very slow for me, and Top pairs should be on top of the page, not on bottom.I would also like to see calculator for custom bitcoin units, like we can see on Coingecko and Coinmarketcap websites.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: I like how the website is clean and loads very fast. No annoying ads (I do hope it stays this way with very minimum or no ads at all) Much better than coinmarketcap. I am definitely going to add it to my arsenal of trading tools.Qtn. Is the price live or one has to refresh it manually?

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: I find it to be much better than last time I went there. You're definitely on the right track.I think that I've found something odd though: I was looking at the wonderful TerraUSD. The main grid (stable coins) shows TerraUSD and 0.09$, clicking into it shows TerraClassicUSD at 0.02$. Bug?Also, can you please check/fix my (old) prediction for Monero? I must have been missing something, since the displayed price doesn't match with the actual prediction.About the survey: imho the dark theme can be better. The white text may be too white? The dark background too dark? I don't know. Maybe in between. And yeah, the background for daily gained/lost % needs to be changed accordingly.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Dark mode works fine but I see that the interface is somewhat similar to most currency tracking sites.The prediction is useless, I note that the predictions for Bitcoin by the end of the current year and there are no predictions in the short term and all of them are illogical ($100,000.00) and this silly reason.Quote Description: I think bitcoin will hit $100,000 this year 2022 because alot of investors are waiting for this to happen, many investors expected it to happen last year 2021 but it didn't, I think it will happen this year as many are already anticipating for it. Quote Description: ATH gonna be 82332 USD, then drop sharply to 45-50k and people will claim bitcoin is dead Logical one:QuoteDescription: For a while we think we entered a bear market then the crypto is booming so we can't really know. Is very unpredictable . I think bitcoin will be around 60k this year and next year we will be bigger if everything will go smoothThe psychological barrier will be higher than one hundred thousand, although it is almost impossible to reach it with all the events that are going on in the world.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: I see a big price difference between your side and other crypto trackers: - Bitcoin                        $20,515.71 (coingecko)  $20,548.21 (CMC) $21,342.00   (coinriders) - Ethereum                    $1,056.84    (coingecko)  $1,062.96  (CMC) $1,134.48   (coinriders)I can show more, but I think that your site has stopped updating prices some time ago, is the problem with the server or do you rely on third-party applications to update the data.Can the site display errors when the data is not updated (for example, the price remains unchanged for a long time), this may lead to reduce your reliability, as many people make decisions based on this data.

comments.author: dhru9
comments.created_time: June 15, 2022, 02:31:45 PMLast edit: June 16, 2022, 05:30:15 AM by dhru9
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on June 15, 2022, 11:21:44 AMI see a big price difference between your side and other crypto trackers: - Bitcoin                        $20,515.71 (coingecko)  $20,548.21 (CMC) $21,342.00   (coinriders) - Ethereum                    $1,056.84    (coingecko)  $1,062.96  (CMC) $1,134.48   (coinriders)I can show more, but I think that your site has stopped updating prices some time ago, is the problem with the server or do you rely on third-party applications to update the data.Can the site display errors when the data is not updated (for example, the price remains unchanged for a long time), this may lead to reduce your reliability, as many people make decisions based on this data.We will fix.

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: Quote from: dhru9 on June 15, 2022, 02:31:45 PMQuote from: hugeblack on June 15, 2022, 11:21:44 AMI see a big price difference between your side and other crypto trackers: - Bitcoin                        $20,515.71 (coingecko)  $20,548.21 (CMC) $21,342.00   (coinriders) - Ethereum                    $1,056.84    (coingecko)  $1,062.96  (CMC) $1,134.48   (coinriders)I can show more, but I think that your site has stopped updating prices some time ago, is the problem with the server or do you rely on third-party applications to update the data.Can the site display errors when the data is not updated (for example, the price remains unchanged for a long time), this may lead to reduce your reliability, as many people make decisions based on this data.I'm aware of it is problem with Coingecko API on the internal pages the price is correct. We let them know about it. I wasn't expected you are using API from coingecko which is supposed to be your competitor.  Are you thinking of creating a tracking program for your website or will you always need to acquire these functional services from your competitors?On the other hand, it cannot be denied that the interface of the site is very distinctive and seems easy to use with less crowding of the elements that appear to the user, and by that I mean the ease of searching and finding the functions to be used .

comments.author: dhru9
comments.body: Quote from: coupable on June 15, 2022, 08:56:54 PMQuote from: dhru9 on June 15, 2022, 02:31:45 PMQuote from: hugeblack on June 15, 2022, 11:21:44 AMI see a big price difference between your side and other crypto trackers: - Bitcoin                        $20,515.71 (coingecko)  $20,548.21 (CMC) $21,342.00   (coinriders) - Ethereum                    $1,056.84    (coingecko)  $1,062.96  (CMC) $1,134.48   (coinriders)I can show more, but I think that your site has stopped updating prices some time ago, is the problem with the server or do you rely on third-party applications to update the data.Can the site display errors when the data is not updated (for example, the price remains unchanged for a long time), this may lead to reduce your reliability, as many people make decisions based on this data.I'm aware of it is problem with Coingecko API on the internal pages the price is correct. We let them know about it. I wasn't expected you are using API from coingecko which is supposed to be your competitor.  Are you thinking of creating a tracking program for your website or will you always need to acquire these functional services from your competitors?On the other hand, it cannot be denied that the interface of the site is very distinctive and seems easy to use with less crowding of the elements that appear to the user, and by that I mean the ease of searching and finding the functions to be used .Coinriders built on top of that our things. Tomorrow we launch notification system on the beta stages. Is not secret that we use other api's too. We're happy to give credit to support them.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: dhru9 on June 16, 2022, 05:34:28 AMIs not secret that we use other api's too. We're happy to give credit to support them.Since you rely on third parties, show several results so that you do not get a wrong data as happened yesterday, and if you include some technical analysis indicators, your platform will be a little different from them.so prices must be the same as https://www.coingecko.com/ right? How do you calculate average prices cuz The price seems perfect for Ethereum but some cryptocurrencies are slightly different.anyway good luck

comments.author: dhru9

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: dhru9 on June 19, 2022, 07:05:14 PMwe add notification system.If you were referring to a feature that allows us to add certain types of alerts, I had no luck in finding it! Am I missing something?Btw, clicking any of the coins leads to a page like "this".
